dmca.title: Lehman Brothers Inc.'s Objection to Registration of www.lehman.us
dmca.body:
July 16, 2003

Via e-mail - Confirmation by First Class Mail


Name Share Inc.
400 West Cummings Park
PMB 1725-307
Woburn, MA  01801

Re:	Lehman Brothers Inc.'s Objection to Registration of www.lehman.us by Name Share Inc. (Our Ref. 223580)

Dear Sir or Madame:

We represent Lehman Brothers Inc. in matters involving trademarks and unfair competition.  It has come to our attention that your company, NameShare Inc., has registered the domain name www.lehman.us and is using the domain name to connect to your company's web site at www.nameshare.com, which offers e-mail and web site services, including offering to sell yourname@lehman.us.  A copy of the registration information for the domain name is enclosed with the confirmation copy of this letter for your review.

Please be advised that our client is the owner of numerous federal trademark registrations for marks similar to the lehman.us domain name, including the following:

		LEHMAN-LOGIC, Registration No. 1796071, registered on
September 28, 1993 and first used in commerce in 1991;

		LEHMAN BANK, Registration No. 2519808, registered on
December 18, 2001 and first used in commerce in 2000;

		LEHMAN FUTURES LIVE, Registration No. 2529704, registered on January 15, 2002 and first used in commerce in 2000;

		LEHMAN PRIMEPLUS, Registration No. 2549090, registered on March 19, 2002 and first used in commerce in 2000;

		LEHMAN BROTHERS, Registration No. 1717171, registered on September 15, 1992 and first used in commerce in 1990;

		LEHMAN BROTHERS (Stylized), Registration No. 1755687,
registered on March 2, 1993 and first used in commerce in 1990;

		SHEARSON LEHMAN BROTHERS, Registration No. 1417691,
registered on November 18, 1986 and first used in commerce in 1985;

		LEHMAN BROTHERS BANK, Registration No. 2381464, registered on August 29, 2000 and first used in commerce in 1999; and

		LEHMAN BROTHERS PRIMEPLUS, Registration No. 2539396,
registered on February 19, 2002 and first used in commerce in 2000.

Lehman Brothers Inc. also uses its LEHMAN mark on its Internet web site at lehman.com.  Our client has continuously and extensively used and advertised its LEHMAN mark in connection with its highest quality financial services, making the mark famous in the United States and worldwide.  As such, the LEHMAN mark is a valuable asset of our client, one it will take all reasonable steps to protect.

Unauthorized registration and use of LEHMAN and lehman.us is likely to cause confusion, mistake, or to deceive the public and is a violation of our client's federally-protected rights under 15 U.S.C.
